results.title: Handling Incomplete Logout Flows Between Keycloak and Azure AD - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: We have configured Keycloak as the authentication provider with Azure Active Directory (AAD) as the Identity Provider (IdP). Our user-facing web applications are connected to Keycloak as clients. Is there a recommended way to detect and handle incomplete logouts at the IdP level?| Hello @Xie, Changning (DFO/MPO) , Thank you for your Response. .

descriptions.content: We have configured Keycloak as the authentication provider with Azure Active Directory (AAD) as the Identity Provider (IdP).
